semantics.label: Terminal Title
semantics.description: Title to display at the top

semantics.label: Preloaded Code
semantics.description: Python code that will run automatically on start

semantics.label: Initial Code in Editor
semantics.description: Code that will appear in the editor (not auto-executed)

semantics.label: Allow user input
semantics.description: Allows code to use input() to request user data

semantics.label: Maximum output lines
semantics.description: Maximum number of lines to show in console
